channel.title: Comments on: OTP Authentication in Dynamics NAV

item.title: By: vishal

item.description: Newtonsoft.Json dll no object please solve this problem.
item.content:encoded: Newtonsoft.Json dll no object please solve this problem.

item.title: By: vishal

item.description: picture is not clear local variable

item.title: By: Ravi Goyal
item.dc:creator: Ravi Goyal
item.content:encoded:
Great Article! Worked successfully for me.

However, following things can be updated in the blog:
1. Url – text constant – ‘https://rest.nexmo.com/sms/json’
2. For Newtonsoft.Json dll -> Copy this dll from C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Dynamics NAV\100\RoleTailored Client and into C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Dynamics NAV\100\RoleTailored Client\Add-ins.
3. There is only one codeunit used wherein all the 4 functions – HttpPostSMS, GetParams, GetRandom, OnBeforeCompanyOpen, are created.
4. TwoFactorAuth – The variable refer the new page ‘Two Factor Auth’ that was created for Input OTP.
5. SMSText – Text Constant – ‘OTP for Login to %1 is %2. Please enter it in NAV.’

Regards,
Ravi Goyal
